ygData.msgSnippet: RE: A wood elf in Misty For what it s worth, I got the best prices from the lady in the hut to the left of the entrance if you are facing the entrance to
ygData.messageBody:
RE: A wood elf in Misty

For what it's worth, I got the best prices from the lady in the hut to the
left of the entrance if you are facing the entrance to Rivervale. I can't
advice staying in Misty too long though. I ended up having to leave because
the guards outside the wall we just too damn protective.

RE: Anything but "twisting"

I've been raised on "stacking", but when chatting with other EQers I
referring to grouping, soloing, travelling, etc scenarios as "gigs" that I
keep to a particular "set list" for. And perform by "sampling" different
songs. "weaving" fits the middle earth feel of EQ better than sampling
though, so I'd agree to that one.

RE: Twitch way do you weave?
I use the mouse. I don't want to waste hotkey space on something that's
already on my screen.

L8R
Web
AKA Evulia (& seven other fine folks) on Tunare
